name: Hungry Boy
storyline:
A hungry Boy went hunting on an empty stomach and is now angry beyond belief, but there is still food along the way, and with it those who guard it, not letting you get enough, and at the end of the way you will find the Ghost of hunger! 
 
Hungry Boy is an adventure platformer shooter in which you have to destroy enemies, overcome various obstacles, collect food and find a way out of the level.
summary: Hungry Boy is an adventure platformer shooter in which you have to destroy enemies, overcome various obstacles, collect food and find a way out of the level.
